pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Asymptomatic Cases via Capture/Recapture Methods // Estimate the lower and upper bound of asymptomatic cases in an epidemic using the capture/recapture methods from Bhning et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.ijid.2020.06.009 and Rocchetti et al. (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.07.14.20153445.
